verbs.description: Administration officials [V: have] been instructed to move forward with plans to convene a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore , according to two people familiar with the plans .

Administration officials have [V: been] instructed to move forward with plans to convene a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore , according to two people familiar with the plans .

[ARG1: Administration officials] have been [V: instructed] [ARG2: to move forward with plans to convene a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: according to two people familiar with the plans] .

[ARG0: Administration officials] have been instructed to [V: move] [ARGM-DIR: forward] [ARG1: with plans to convene a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , according to two people familiar with the plans .

[ARG0: Administration officials] have been instructed to move forward with plans to [V: convene] [ARG1: a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , according to two people familiar with the plans .

Administration officials have been instructed to move forward with plans to convene a historic summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore , [V: according] to two people familiar with the plans .
